Directions: In a skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Stir in flour and salt until blended. Stir in soup, consomme and mustard. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes. Stir in the noodles and sour cream; heat through (do not boil).
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
8 ounces wide egg noodles, cooked and drained
